glosses: fleshy, porky, chubby, slightly fat (not lean or thin)

examples.text: Ayının ağzında çırpınan, semiz bir balık var.
examples.translation: The bear has a flopping, fat fish in its mouth.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish سمیز (semiz, “fat, obese”), from Old Anatolian Turkish سمز (semüz), from Proto-Turkic *semiŕ (“fat”). Cognate with Kazakh семіз (semız, “fat”), Kyrgyz семиз (semiz, “fat”), etc.
